post_text:
Dear Charter School Families,

The Governor used the line item veto to strike a section of the School Aid Budget that allows for the PSA max to increase with the state minimum. This effectively eliminated the $240/pupil increase for ALL CHARTER SCHOOLS. Traditional public schools will still receive their increases as originally proposed.

Act now to tell your lawmakers that charter schools deserve equal funding.
bit.ly/actnow-micharterfunding

post_text:
Dear Academy Families;

On Friday, May 10, 2019, Governor Whitmer signed House Bill 4206, known as the "snow day bill," which forgives four additional snow days that occurred while the state was under a state of emergency due to extreme cold temperatures.

The Michigan Department of Education is currently creating a waiver process. Once the process is set, FBR Charter Schools will immediately apply for the waiver for each Academy.

We anticipate that the last day of school for students will remain as scheduled for Thursday, June 13th.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.
text:
Dear Academy Families;

On Friday, May 10, 2019, Governor Whitmer signed House Bill 4206, known as the "snow day bill," which forgives four additional snow days that occurred while the state was under a state of emergency due to extreme cold temperatures.

The Michigan Department of Education is currently creating a waiver process. Once the process is set, FBR Charter Schools will immediately apply for the waiver for each Academy.

We anticipate that the last day of school for students will remain as scheduled for Thursday, June 13th.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

shared_text:
GVSU Charter Schools Office
January 14, 2019 at 7:43 PM ·

Today is a day for celebration! 🥳🙌

On this day 25 years ago, a bill allowing for the creation of charter schools in Michigan was signed into law. Shortly after, GVSU chartered its first school, serving approximately 300 students (that's you, Excel Charter Academy!!!).

Today, we charter schools for more than 36,000 students! GVSU is proud to provide #schoolchoice opportunities for so many families! #charterschools #25years
